WELCOME.description: PUT 'true' OR 'false' TO ENABLE & DISABLE WELCOME

GOODBYE.description: FIX 'false' OR 'true' TO ENABLE & DISABLE GOODBYE

TZ.description: PUT TIME_ZONE ACCORDING TO YOUR LOCATION

FLUSH.description: MAKE IT 'TRUE' IF BOT CONNECTED BUT NOT RESPONED (AFTER DEPLOYEMENT!)

READ_COMMAND.description: MILES BLUE TICKS COMMANDS IF THIS IS SET 'true'

WARN_COUNT.description: WARN COUNT FOR USERS TO KICK/BLOCK WHEN WARN LIMIT IS EXCEEDED!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: PUT YOUR HEROKU API KEY HERE

SUDO.description: THE PHONE NUMBERS OF THE USERS WHO YOU WANT TO BE ADMIN FOR THE BOT (SHOULD BE IN INTERNATIONAL FORMAT WITHOUT + AND MULTIPLE NUMBERS MUST BE SEPARATED BY A COMMA ",")

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: PUT YOUR HEROKU APP NAME HERE-ALL CHARACTERS MUST BE IN LOWERCASE

WAPRESENCE.description: FILL THE VALUE: 'unavailable'(FOR NOTHING) | 'available'(FOR ALWAYSONLINE) | 'composing'(FOR TYPING) | 'recording' | 'PAUSED'

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: FILL THE VALUE TRUE IF YOU WANT BOT TO VIEW YOUR CONTACT STATUS.

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: FILL THE VALUE 'true' IF YOU WANT TO SEE MESSAGES IN LOGS.

READ_MESSAGE.description: FILL THE VALUE TRUE IF YOU WANT BOT TO READ ALL MESSAGES.

DISABLE_PM.description: MAKE IT 'false' IF YOU WANNA RUN BOT IN YOUR PM (IF MODE IS PUBLIC)

PREFIX.description: ENTER YOUR DESIRED PREFIX FOR BOT. YOU CAN SET `All |null | . | .!*`

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: PUT YOUR OPENAI API KEY HERE.GET IT FROM BETA.OPENAI.COM

ELEVENLAB_API_KEY.description: PUT YOUR ELEVENLAB API KEY HERE FOR AITTS.

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: PUT YOUR REMOVE BG KEY HERE.
